messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] water, water everywhere!
messages.msgSnippet: Instead of those rubber ones that fall of the tops there are those proper ones that kind of hook up like a regular shower and can also be unhooked and held
messages.messageBody:
Instead of those rubber ones that fall of the tops there are those "proper"
ones that kind of hook up like a regular shower and can also be unhooked and
held in hand (also great for singing in the shower!!!)

Michelle

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] water, water everywhere!
messages.msgSnippet: before we moved to our new house (1 bath, 2 showers, 3 toilets, NO character!!) we used those hand-held numbers and we found that they worked for a while then
messages.messageBody:
before we moved to our new house (1 bath, 2 showers, 3 toilets, NO character!!) we used those hand-held numbers and we found that they worked for a while then eventually they started falling off the taps, but at only Â£3.50 a throw it wasn't so bad :-)
 
My kids grouse when they're in the bath together, even when they wanted to share!! go figure!!
 
Tracy
----- Original Message -----
From: Shannon CC
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 6:09 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] water, water everywhere!

From: Shannon CC <shannoncc@...>

LOL! Yes, it is an unschool suggestion :-) Well, first I'll have to get
rid of the floor mats and then clean up all the magazines that are
stacked on the library, um, I mean bathroom floor. Otherwise we'll have
mushy floor mats, soggy issues of Mothering and drippy Woodworking
catalogs :-) Of course, first I'll have to get the hand held shower
thingy . . . . .

Shannon, Mom to Bridget (Oct.8.98)


libbygirl wrote:
> Hi Shannon,
> Ummm possibly in fact, probably water will end up everywhere! We were lucky
> in that the base of our shower was quite deep ( I think they call it a
> Shub(??) But still at least she would be happy, you would be clean and
> smelling daisy-fresh (lol) and the bathroom floor would be clean!! Sounds
> like a very unschool suggestion to me!! *evilgrin*
> Regards,
> Michelle

messages.msgSnippet: Shannon Ain t it grand how one thing just naturally leads to another in the Unschooling lifestyle!?? *giggling madly* Regards, Michelle
messages.messageBody:
Shannon
Ain't it grand how one thing just naturally leads to another in the

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] water, water everywhere!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Shannon, Ummm possibly in fact, probably water will end up everywhere! We were lucky in that the base of our shower was quite deep ( I think they call it a
messages.messageBody:
Hi Shannon,
Ummm possibly in fact, probably water will end up everywhere! We were lucky
in that the base of our shower was quite deep ( I think they call it a
Shub(??) But still at least she would be happy, you would be clean and
smelling daisy-fresh (lol) and the bathroom floor would be clean!! Sounds
like a very unschool suggestion to me!! *evilgrin*


Regards,
Michelle
